Yes. Please stop.. At least try to! It fucks up your life and the scars only remind you of what everything was like. My recommendation would be to tell a parent what has happened or tell someone you trust.. But someone you know irl. (Not your friends.. an adult.) So far all my scars have done is made me rub my arm because im uncomfortable and makes me feel like doing it again. Its unhealthy so please donâ€™t continue â¤ï¸ Youâ€™re amazing and I love you. One day it will become a habit and trust me. It will become a shit-show. Stay safe â¤ï¸ You are amazing. Stay strong hun x
